ygData.subject: Re: mana
ygData.msgSnippet: the int addition is while the item is equipped, it is not a permanent increase.  nothing in this game will grant a permanent increase to stats. the bonuses
ygData.messageBody:
the int addition is while the item is equipped, it is not a permanent
increase. nothing in this game will grant a permanent increase to stats.
the bonuses granted by the int bonus increases the higher your lvl is- your
mana total is calculated by lvl and int, plus any +mana items

belphenor

>From: phrederick <fire3@...>
>
>does the mana you have get increased immediately when you
>add +int equipment, or does it only increase it after you
>level? what i mean is, do you get the same increase for
>getting a +2 int earing and first wearing it at level 15,
>as you would if you have had it since level 1?
